Opened issue "OpemXmlPackage.Clone() does not copy PackageProperties" (#1150) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "Wordprocessing: Add explicit properties to Table" (#1149) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
`DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Wordprocessing.Table` should provide properties to explicitly access some of its fixed fields, like `TableProperties`, `TableGrid` and its collection of `TableRow`s.
This would match how several other classes already work (`Paragraph.ParagraphProperties`, `Run.RunProperties`, ...).
`TableRow` might also appreciate a way to explicitly access its cells, unless `.Descendants<TableCell>()` is deemed enough.
